programme.desc: Top New York City publicist Hazel Miller is tasked with spinning the image of MLB pitcher Diego Vasquez, who froze during Game 7 of the World Series. He also happens to be the guy who broke her heart in high school.

programme.desc: After being hired as a nanny by a widowed, work-obsessed man, Poppy teaches the family that unconditional love, family and the joy of everyday occurrences are the most important things in life.

programme.desc: Stella designs hats and fascinators for socialite Rosalind and meets her son Christian who's training a horse to compete in the Louisville Derby.
